about_the_game:
Are you ready to accept The Gummiest Bear Challenge ?

It is a physics based 3D platformer where you race against time.
Try to get the best time possible by completing various fun/challenging levels.
You control a jelly-like bear (that is part of the challenge) and you have to roll & jump to get you through the levels that are filled with some obstacles.

You can play the game as single player or with your friend using local multiplayer mode (split screen).

The game is intended to be like "easy to pickup, but hard to master" kind of game so it has some light precision platforming elements to it.

This game utilizes 3D spatial audio elements to give more immersion so headphones are recommended but not required.

Key Features:

  • For fans of 3D platformers and people who likes fun racing games and wants some new challenge
  • No racing cars only gummy bears
  • 1 - 2 player time challenge
  • Multiple levels (new levels are unlocked after previous levels are completed)
  • 3D spatial audio to add some immersion
  • Easy to pickup but hard to master
  • Light precision platforming
  • Challenging controls (can be learnt pretty quickly)
  • Keyboard + mouse and most gamepads (similar to XBOX-360) are supported

name: The Gummiest Bear Challenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

You control a jelly-like bear (that is part of the challenge) and you have to roll & jump to get you through the levels that are filled with some obstacles.
